story.description: The Times says its promise to a source prevents the paper from posting the video, which shows Barack Obama praising Palestinian activist Rashid Khalidi at a 2003 banquet.
story.title: McCain camp accuses L.A. Times of 'suppressing' Obama video

story.description: I've been watching the news for the last few days (or maybe the last week) and frankly the fact that any intelligent idea actually gets out and discussed in the national media seems far-fetched and impossible. According to right wing talkers/news outlets, Obama is a socialist and that's bad. Unfortunately, the real socialists are the Republicans.
story.title: Republicans are The Real Socialists

story.description: A bitter Florida State Senate campaign has taken a nastier turn after Republican candidate Nancy Detert received e-mail death threats and had her e-mail account hacked.
story.title: Another GOP E-mail Hacked

story.description: They’re the cardinals of creativity. The trailblazers of transformation. The messiahs of messaging. They’re key agents of influence in the ever-growing Applesphere, and they’re 10 people to watch, next year and beyond.

story.description: A chart for anyone wanting to learn the chemical names for what is deemed "vulgar" might find this useful.
story.title: Periodic Table of Vulgarity

story.description: During a press call today about Canonical's forthcoming Ubuntu release, Mark Shuttleworth said that no one can make money from the Linux desktop. On the other hand, he doesn't think Microsoft will be making much money from desktop operating system for much longer either.
story.title: Shuttleworth: No one can make money from the Linux desktop.

story.description: I compared a new 3/4" Bosch DareDevil spade bit against a new 11/16" brand name spade bit. I used 11/16" because it was all I had that was new. The advantage, if any, would go to the smaller 11/16" bit. The first thing I noticed is how much faster the DareDevil cuts through the wood compared to the standard bit. Bosch claims 2.4 times faster...
story.title: Video: Bosch DareDevil spade bit review

story.description: A new study reveals that the brain's "love" and "hate" circuits share identical structures.
story.title: Brain has thin line between love and hate, scientists reveal

story.description: Socialmarker is one of the great addon , which easily let you submit your post to top 21 bookmarking site, Or people who are fond of social bookmarking they can easily tag n bookmark any post.This Is an addon for Mozilla Firefox..!!
story.title: Firefox addon for Social Bookmarking: Socialmarker

story.description: All about the Obama Bar all natural soap at www.myobamabar.com - this is a really clever concept that provides a portion of its proceeds to the Yellow Ribbon Fund to assist injured war veterans at Walter Reed hospital. Check it out.
story.title: Obama Bar - The Audacity of Soap

story.description: Charles is a volunteer from Boulder, CO. He won a raffle to meet Barack at the rally in Denver on 10/26/08. You should watch this.
story.title: Charles Meets Barack

story.description: Ok, so I guess the news was a shock to all of us when it came to the sudden switch in casting from Terrence Howard to Don Cheadle in Iron Man 2. I still think it's probably because Terrence could be a total nutjob but that's my opinion, and I have a small brain so opinions like that are all I can come up with.
story.title: Want Terrence Howard Back On Iron Man 2?

story.description: Digg’s response to these systems: they have complete knowledge of them and have thus taken power away from the users. Their response was challenged when an editor of Wired.com used this automated system. $400 later, Digg’s front page featured a ridiculous article of pictures of crowds. Charging $300 SocialElves say they do things the right way.
story.title: SocialElves and Others Threatening Digg’s Control

story.description: Google will pay $125 million to resolve claims by authors and publishers and to pay legal fees, as well as create a Book Rights Registry where copyright holders can register works to get a cut of Internet ad revenue and online book sales.
story.title: Google, Authors and Publishers Settle Book-Scan Suit

story.description: The CoolPix 6000 comes with a built in GPS or Global Positioning System so you can ‘geotag’ your images! Then, connect the camera directly to the internet through the built in LAN connector and upload images directly to Nikon’s free online gallery my Picturetown or view the images on maps at ViewNX.
story.title: Nikon CoolPix 6000: Camera Review

story.description: The McCain campaign continues to snipe at each other over the handling, and subsequent effect, of Sarah Palin on the campaign trail. According Nicole Wallace, a senior McCain aide who is one of Palin's handlers and helped to orchestrate her initial rollout, there is a 'organized campaign to lay blame' for things at her feet.
story.title: Palin Knew Nothing About National And International Issues.

story.description: MMORPGs are addiction... Really addiction. How many times have you forgotten to eat while playing WoW? I have... More than once.

story.description: After a long day of work or travel many relax at a spa with a mud bath or body scrub but not in southern Italy. The current hottest trend in Italy is to relax with a Hay Bath. First thing that comes to my mind when thinking of a hay bath is a stinky barn yard. So what exactly is a Hay bath? Who ever thought of it? And what exactly
story.title: Italy Revolutionizes Spas with Milk, Mud and Hay Baths...

story.description: While the Republicans had the distracted media searching for links between Obama and ACORN, RNC operatives were busily completing one of the most massive voter suppression and purging efforts in American history, stealing hundreds of thousands of Democratic votes across the embattled swing states and striving to arrange chaos and endless lines at t
story.title: How cries of voter fraud cover up GOP elections theft

story.description: The SDK and the success of the App Store have combined to create an emerging professional category, that of iPhone application developer. According to oDesk, a technology outsourcer billing itself as the “leading marketplace and global IT platform for outsourcing technology jobs to certified, freelance, Apple iPhone developers”.

story.description: Massachusetts State Sen. Dianne Wilkerson was arrested this morning following a “painstaking” 18-month undercover investigation, during which she was allegedly caught on tape stuffing a cash bribe into her bra and taking payoffs to push through a Roxbury night club liquor license.
story.title: FBI films state senator stuffing $1,000 bribe into her bra

story.description: The instant comic classic continues!
story.title: The Secretary 3

story.description: Australia's government-mandated Internet filtering system won't allow users to opt out of a filtering tier that targets "illegal" material. But a conservative party is already suggesting that legal material be added to the mandatory tier.
story.title: Australia's Internet filter: legal content be banned, too?

story.description: The Tribler BitTorrent client, a project run by researchers from several European universities and Harvard, is the first to incorporate decentralized search capabilities. With Tribler, users can now find .torrent files that are hosted among other peers, instead of on a centralized site such as The Pirate Bay or Mininova.
story.title: Tribler Set to Make BitTorrent Sites Obsolete

story.description: Do you sometimes find yourself wishing that there was a place you could go to just watch music videos? Back in the 80s, MTV served that purpose.MTV is looking to redeem itself in the music video department, however, by launching a new site Tuesday called MTV Music that opens up the company's massive video archive and puts it on the web for free.
story.title: MTV smacks YouTube, posts almost every music video ever

story.description: We love Halloween and we love video games. So with Halloween coming up in just a few days, we thought we’d share with you our picks for the best video game Halloween costumes.
story.title: The 6 Best Video Game Costumes for Halloween

story.description: How long does it take to remake an icon? Try five months.
story.title: What Went Into Pepsi's New Logo?

story.description: Some products are more easily advertised than others and condom ads probably require the most delicate touch of all. Here are a collection of 22 ads from around the world, some more subtle than others.

story.description: The Cardiff GiantA ten-foot "petrified man" was dug up on a small farm in Cardiff, New York, in October 1869. The "Cardiff Giant" became a huge news story and many Americans travelled to see it.
story.title: Seven of the greatest scientific hoaxes

story.description: Audience members escorted out of Sen. John McCain’s, R-Ariz., campaign event in Cedar Falls, IA questioned why they were asked to leave Sunday’s rally even though they were not protesting.McCain staffers requested police assist in escorting out “about four or five” people from the rally prior to McCain’s speech.
story.title: Students get boot @ McCain event, some early voted for him!

story.description: More than 600 adults have been arrested and 47 children rescued in a three-day roundup in the U.S. targeting people who force children into prostitution. The FBI said the roundup occurred in 29 cities and dismantled 12 large-scale prostitution operations run through call services, truck stops, casinos and Web sites.
story.title: 642 adults arrested in child prostitution roundup

story.description: Helicopters http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/helicopter featuring coaxial rotor designs are not exactly new. The co-axial design of a pair of rotors mounted on the same mast and with the same axis of rotation, but turning in different directions, has been utilized on a number of military helicopters for around half a century,
story.title: Coaxial Rotor System: the future of helicopter design?

story.description: "Million Dollar Quartet" tells the story of the impromptu 1956 jam session of Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, Carl Perkins and Johnny Cash. story.title: Elvis Presley's mysterious lost girlfriend

story.description: This is a new type of Nigerian scam going around the web. They are targeting all pet lovers and also targeting all pet sites. How heartless are these people, to try and rob people by stating they need help because someone in their family is dead?! There are some sick, malicious people in this world that would steal from a baby in a second....
story.title: Latest Nigerian Scam Using Pitbull Puppies!

story.description: An analyst recently said that Apple has room to cut the price of its iPhone in half, devastate competitors in the process, and go on to rule the smartphone market. There’s only one problem: There's no evidence to back it up.

story.description: Like Elvis in '68, Microsoft is itching for a "comeback," and Windows 7 is the perfect excuse. In fact, this week in LA at the Professional Developers Conference, Windows 7 officially shoved Vista aside. On Sunday, they took journalists through a lively 7-hour orientation on Win 7, then handed off a Dell XPS M1330 loaded with pre-beta Build 6801.
story.title: Windows 7 Walkthrough, Boot Video and Impressions

story.description: JS Charts is a free JavaScript based chart generator that requires little or no coding. With JS Charts drawing charts is a simple and easy task, since you only have to use client-side scripting (i.e. performed by your web browser). No additional plugins or server modules are required.

story.description: Mr. Obama, Teddy Roosevelt said about a hundred years ago that we Americans should first look at the character of our leaders before anything else.Your character looks horrible.While you make good speeches, motivating speeches, your character does not match your rhetoric. You talk the talk but do not walk the walk. You've lied too many times to us.

story.description: The dogs occupied a niche in men’s lives in the past, but the public attention for dogs in the recent period is going down. You can own a pet like dog in the provision of custodial and other jobs that can be carried out by a dog. People is giving up the dogs more than in the past as we left the age of farms and farmers and also hunters..

story.description: It remains to be seen if the Republican party can recover from its long and seedy affair with the extreme right, but there is no doubt that many socially moderate, fiscally conservative Republicans are waiting for a leadership that is driven more by Goldwater ethics than by the bogeyman of a separatist, neo-con God.
story.title: Jane Devin: The Christian Right Killed the Republican Party

story.description: Close associate says president is sick due to strains of position, but that he will "eventually heal." The months ahead are critical for Ahmadinejad to try to rebuild his political base and rebut critics pointing to his unfulfilled campaign promises, including extending the wealth of Iran's oil revenue to poorer provinces around the country.
story.title: Iran media confirms: Ahmadinejad is ill

story.description: Your web site has been up for a few months and you are making money hand over foot. While surfing sites one evening, you are shocked to find a competitor using your design. You find out your designer sold them the same design. They must be breaking the law, right? It all depends on whether you own the copyright to your web site design.
story.title: Do You Own Your Web Site Design

story.description: In September, Royal Caribbean took delivery on the next biggest thing: the Oasis of the Seas, a floating city for more than 5,400. It's nearly five times the weight of the Titanic and 89 feet longer than the supercarrier USS Ronald Reagan. Judging by history, this Caribbean queen's reign won't last long.

story.description: An intrepid researcher has discovered more than 200 tax liens totaling more than $3.7 million have been filed by the government against the Association of Community Organizers for Reform Now for unpaid taxes since the late eighties. I wonder if this will be on CNN ? MSNBC?

story.description: It seems the Obama Camp is already cutting down the net before the game even begins. We're wondering what plans have been made in the event that Obama loses to handle the 1,000,000 plus crowd that Mayor Daley predicts will descend upon Grant Park, Chicago.
